forecast.day_comments: Snow showers. Some thunder is also possible.  Steady temperature around 24. West southwest wind around 5 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow, mainly before 2pm.  Temperature falling to around 15 by 5pm. Wind chill values as low as 2. Northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of 2 to 4 inches possible.
